Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that journalist Ravish Kumar called the rape of the 11-year-old girl as consensual sex. Ravish Kumar himself clarified that the message circulating on social media is not his words and is fake.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the statement attributed to Ravish Kumar by falsely stating that he called the rape as consensual sex.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible source provided to verify the statement attributed to Ravish Kumar.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the statement attributed to Ravish Kumar is true without providing any evidence or verification.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the false claim about Ravish Kumar is being spread by the IT cell to provoke people against him, as stated by Ravish Kumar himself.
